summary: Developed an iPad game for Oxford Properties to promote recycling and sustainability in their buildings. Gave the tenants a fun way of learning what is recyclable.

name: GeriatRx Pharmacy
summary: Allows a doctor to view a patient's history, drug interactions, as well as enter their patient's prescriptions, from a tablet.

name: Ontario Liberal Party
summary: Implementation of two new content-managed websites for Ontario Liberal Party. Short timeline and rapid execution was performed to release the new website for September 2010 and September 2011. First website accommodated the DotNetNuke CMS engine and second website performed custom integration with OLP internal web services that were utilized as data source.
tags: C#, Javascript, CSS, HTML, SQL Server, DotNetNuke, XML

name: theObituaries.ca
summary: A site that gives you the opportunity to create an obituary or memorial for a friend or family member. You can also share obituaries on Facebook or Twitter.
tags: C#, Javascript, jQuery, CSS3, HTML5, SQL Server, DotNetNuke, PHP, mySQL, WordPress

name: Chatr
summary: Coordinated the execution of a full-cycle online/mobile contest on a short deadline and restricted budget for Rogers Chatr Wireless customers. The online portion of the contest allowed Rogers Chatr wireless customers to enter a valid Chatr phone number to participate in the contest and possibly win prizes. They would receive text messages if they won a prize or receive a number to enter into the web site.
tags: C#, Javascript, CSS, HTML, SQL Server, XML

name: fRed.ca
summary: Custom social media network was developed for Ontario Liberal Party (fred.ca), where party members can join a certain group and message each other through an internal messaging system.
tags: C#, Javascript, CSS3, HTML5, SQL Server

name: Benjamin Memorial Chapel
summary: This is a popular Jewish funeral home website which is managed by our team.

summary: Created an eShop app to allow the sales people to quickly place orders of fabric and designs, while they are with their customers in their shop or home.

name: John Hancock: Retirement Plan Services
summary: A portal is created for each of the representatives, in order to allow the user to find a representative in their area, and get basic information on investments from them. Each representative has their own blog to inform the user what is happening at John Hancock.
tags: #, Javascript, jQuery, CSS3, HTML5, SQL Server, DotNetNuke, PHP, mySQL, WordPress
